gene.function: FUNCTION: May serve as a regulatory subunit and allow allosteric feedback inhibition of GMPPB by GDP-mannose. {ECO:0000269|PubMed:24035193}.
gene.subcellularLocation: SUBCELLULAR LOCATION: Cytoplasm {ECO:0000269|PubMed:24035193}. Note=Myc-tagged GMPPA shows a diffuse cytoplasmic and nuclear pattern in transfected COS-7 cells.
